data.actual_result: You're locked into the CVV box
data.expected_result: It jumps to postcode (as it does with everything) and enters the numbers
data.short_description: When entering card details for Nitro, adding the first digits of a postcode then deleting them won't let you reenter them unless you click on the box
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Discord Nitro purchase box - Enter card details up to postcode - Enter 1~2 characters - Delete them until you're back to CVV - Try and re-enter the postcode
